name: Health First Camp
description: A general health screening camp offering basic checkups and consultations.

name: Wellness Checkup Camp
description: Comprehensive wellness evaluations including blood tests and physician advice.

name: Family Health Camp
description: Health checkups for all age groups, focusing on family wellbeing and disease prevention.

name: Senior Care Camp
description: Specialized services for the elderly including blood pressure, diabetes, and bone health screenings.

name: Child Wellness Camp
description: Routine child checkups, growth tracking, and nutritional guidance for young ones.

name: Community Immunization Camp
description: Free vaccination services for children and adults to enhance community immunity.

name: Dental Care Camp
description: Oral health checkups, dental cleaning, and hygiene education for all ages.

name: Vision Screening Camp
description: Eye examinations, vision tests, and basic eye care consultations for all.

name: Women's Health Camp
description: Dedicated to women's health concerns including gynecological checkups and wellness advice.

name: Nutrition Awareness Camp
description: Focuses on dietary education, BMI analysis, and personalized nutrition plans.

name: Mental Health Support Camp
description: Free counseling sessions, mental health checkups, and emotional wellness workshops.

name: Postnatal Care Camp
description: Special care and advice for new mothers and infants during the postnatal period.

name: Diabetes Awareness Camp
description: Blood sugar tests and educational sessions on diabetes management and prevention.

name: Heart Health Camp
description: ECG, blood pressure screening, and lifestyle tips for heart health.

name: Skin Health Camp
description: Diagnosis of common skin conditions and free skin care consultation.

name: Hearing Check Camp
description: Audiometry tests and hearing aid guidance for all age groups.

name: Occupational Health Camp
description: Checkups and safety consultations for industrial workers.

name: Adolescent Health Camp
description: Health education, counseling, and basic screening for teens.

name: Pre-Marital Health Camp
description: Basic health tests and counseling for soon-to-be-married couples.

name: Thyroid Awareness Camp
description: TSH testing and awareness about thyroid disorders.

name: Bone Health Camp
description: Bone density testing and consultations for joint health.

name: Vaccination Awareness Camp
description: Raising awareness and verifying immunization status for all.

name: Liver Health Camp
description: Hepatitis screening, liver function tests, and liver health guidance.

name: Allergy Testing Camp
description: Skin prick testing and consultation for allergy-related issues.

name: Reproductive Health Camp
description: Educational sessions and screenings related to reproductive health.
